I am 22 years old student, based in Edinburgh, Scotland. I have studied Computer science & Mathematics at the University of Edinburgh

and this is meant to be my experimental website. I will publish here anything that I find worthwhile. This will include competitive programming and problem solving strategies, Project Euler solutions, clear code and many other things that I find neat.
